name: The Adventures Of Stanley
description:
Hi! I'm Stanley...

After being rudely captured by the mysterious ??????? , help Stanley make their way through the trials to find out who is behind this.

Controls:

MovementWASD / Arrow keysJumpW
Fire sporeZStartEnter

This was our first ever game jam... or game for that matter, submitted for GBJAM10. 

Credits:
